source.query:
SELECT table_schema, table_name
FROM information_schema.tables
WHERE table_schema = 'public'
  AND table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
  AND table_name !~ '^payment_';

activities.name: Lookup1
activities.description: Lookup for getting schema and table name from SQL Query

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT 
    s.name AS SchemaName, 
    t.name AS TableName
FROM sys.tables t
JOIN sys.schemas s ON t.schema_id = s.schema_id
where s.name like '%SalesLT%'
